name: The Adventures of Bruce Flea
description:
Welcome to "The Adventures Of Bruce Flea" , an action-packed fighting game where Kung fu powered Fleas live, love, and engage in thrilling battles across vast microscopic lands of the dog. Take on the role of Bruce Flea, a pint-sized martial arts powerhouse, as he embarks on a remarkable journey to get revenge for his parents' mysterious demise. Raised by his mentor, Master Chan, Bruce has been instilled with combat skills and the profound wisdom of the Tao of the Dog.

You'll face off against various enemies ending with Bruce's formidable adversary, Master Kill Flea, a ruthless kingpin relentlessly searching for the ancient Medallions of Power. These artifacts, brimming with incredible abilities, have been passed down through generations and was the reason Bruce's parents was murdered. Prepare yourself for heart-pounding action as you navigate through four exciting stages, including Chowtown, the sacred Many Flea Temple, the bustling marketplace, and the infamous Club Oderous.

  • The game features an intense story mode, where you'll follow Bruce's path as he tests his mettle against the most vicious criminals in Chowtown. Defeat enemies in exhilarating combat encounters, each bringing you one step closer to the ultimate showdown with Master Kill Flea.
  • Immerse yourself in the game's captivating atmosphere with original music, reminiscent of old-school black exploitation kung fu movie soundtracks, creating an authentic 70's / 80's feel.
  • The Adventures Of Bruce Flea seamlessly integrates with Xbox controllers, allowing for intuitive controls and smooth gameplay.
  • Dive into a visually stunning world, adorned with beautiful, colorful graphics that brings the Doggyverse to life. Enjoy the simplicity of the gameplay, where victory is earned through sheer skill and determination. Are you ready to embark on this action-packed fighting journey and confront the nefarious Master Kill Flea? The fate of the Doggyverse rests in your hands!

  • Original music with an old school kung fu movie explotation feel.
  • works with xbox controller
  • beautiful colorful graphics
  • Simple to the point gameplay.
